```{r}
library(tidyverse)
malaria <- read_csv("~/Desktop/portfolio-aisling06/data/estimated_numbers.csv")
```

```{r}
malaria_clean <- malaria %>%
  select(Country, Year, `No. of cases_median`) %>%
  rename(
    country = Country,
    year = Year,
    cases = `No. of cases_median`
  )

```

```{r}
library(plotly)
fig <- plot_ly(
  data = malaria_clean,
  locations = ~country,
  locationmode = 'country names',
  z = ~cases,
  text = ~paste(country, "<br>Cases:", cases),
  type = 'choropleth',
  frame = ~year,
  colorscale = 'Reds',
  marker = list(line = list(color = "gray", width = 0.5))
)

fig <- fig %>%
  layout(
    title = "Estimated Malaria Cases Over Time (Median)",
    geo = list(
      showframe = FALSE,
      showcoastlines = FALSE
    ),
    coloraxis = list(colorbar = list(title = "Cases"))
  )

fig

```
